title: [BUG] linux-riscv64/libSkiaSharp.so: undefined symbol: FT_Get_BDF_Property
body:
### Description

A RISC-V 64 .NET 9.0 application can't run with this error:
/home/gamma/Downloads/WattToolkit/Steam++: symbol lookup error: /home/gamma/Downloads/WattToolkit/native/linux-riscv64/libSkiaSharp.so: undefined symbol: FT_Get_BDF_Property
SkiaSharp version:3.119.0-preview.1.2

### Code

https://github.com/4Darmygeometry/SteamTools

_No response_
